class_notes: Credit is variable, 1.00 - 12.00 (For 3.00 hrs/week = 1.00 credit). Students must have consent of faculty member (inside or outside of the department) and agreement on a topic. Students are required to complete a PSYC 498R/499R Contract with a faculty member who agreed to supervise the student's work. Contract is available through Lorenza Houser (lhouser@emory.edu). Please e-mail Ms. Houser to obtain a copy of the contract. Enrollment in PSYC 498R is done administratively. Completed and signed contract must be returned to Ms. Houser on or before the end of add/drop/swap for enrollment.
course_description: Credit variable. Psychology majors only, registration by permission of faculty supervisor.
sections: Class Nbr: 2570, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Barber, Status: Open
